descriptions.content: rdul tshon gyi cho ga, thig tshon gyi cho ga [TBRC = thig tshon = T1311]. Ex: Ni gu lugs kyi bde mchog lha lnga'i rdul tshon gyi cho ga'i 'don 'grigs (W29873), Bde mchog dril bu lugs kyi phyi rdul tshon gyi cho ga (W21444), Nag po chen po lcam dral gyi sgrub pa'i sngon 'gro sa dang thig tshon gyi cho ga (W28731).
